lang-dev-center-description.message: Extend your Geocortex applications to build virtually anything!

lang-web-description.message: Combine the 3D and 2D capabilities of Esri's latest JavaScript API to deliver cutting-edge mapping applications

lang-mobile-description.message: Develop field data collection apps and run them online or offline.

lang-workflow-description.message: Extend your Geocortex applications to build virtually anything!

lang-report-description.message: Create sophisticated, professional-looking reports that include spatial and non-spatial data from ArcGIS map services, tables, databases, and other data sources.
